codex-account-switcher.reason: Reads/writes ~/.codex/auth.json by design — account switching requires credential file manipulation

codex-quota.reason: Temporarily overwrites ~/.codex/auth.json during --all account scan — inherent to multi-account quota checking

snapmaker-2.pattern: token is transmitted as a URL query parameter
snapmaker-2.reason: Snapmaker firmware API requires token as query param — device does not support Authorization headers. LAN-only API.

tesla-fleet-api.reason: Installs official Tesla vehicle-command proxy from github.com/teslamotors/vehicle-command at pinned version v0.4.1 — required for local BLE/HTTP proxy

revolut.pattern: storing any form of PIN in plaintext
revolut.reason: PIN is a non-secret personal identification number for starting the Revolut auth flow, not a credential. Documented in SKILL.md.
